entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
